org.jasig.cas.support.spnego.web.flow.client

Class HostNameSpnegoKnownClientSystemsFilterAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.webflow.action.AbstractAction
      • org.jasig.cas.support.spnego.web.flow.client.BaseSpnegoKnownClientSystemsFilterAction
        • org.jasig.cas.support.spnego.web.flow.client.HostNameSpnegoKnownClientSystemsFilterAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean, org.springframework.webflow.execution.Action

    @Component(value="hostnameSpnegoClientAction")
public class HostNameSpnegoKnownClientSystemsFilterAction
extends BaseSpnegoKnownClientSystemsFilterAction
    A simple implementation of BaseSpnegoKnownClientSystemsFilterAction to allow / skip SPNEGO / KRB / NTLM authentication based on a regex match against a reverse DNS lookup of the requesting system.
    Since:
    4.1

public HostNameSpnegoKnownClientSystemsFilterAction(@NotNull@Value(value="${cas.spnego.hostname.pattern:something.+}")
                                                      java.lang.String hostNamePatternString)
        Instantiates a new hostname spnego known client systems filter action.
        Parameters:
        hostNamePatternString - the host name pattern string. The pattern to match the retrieved hostname against.

    • Method Detail

      • shouldDoSpnego

        protected boolean shouldDoSpnego(java.lang.String remoteIp)
        Default implementation -- simply check the IP filter..

        Checks whether the IP should even be paid attention to, then does a reverse DNS lookup, and if it matches the supplied pattern, performs SPNEGO else skips the process.

        Overrides:
        shouldDoSpnego in class BaseSpnegoKnownClientSystemsFilterAction
        Parameters:
        remoteIp - The remote ip address to validate
        Returns:
        true boolean
